data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Al Hudaydah, Yemen.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Hudaydah, Yemen
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 549 believers in the state of Al Hudaydah with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Al Hudaydah, Yemen to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Pour your Spirit out on the 2,621,000 citizens of Al Hudaydah, Yemen, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, Tihami people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Al Hudaydah, Yemen that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Al Hudaydah, Yemen.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 549 believers living in Al Hudaydah, Yemen.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

location.name: Al Hudaydah
